document.full_text: iran has postponed blinding a convicted man in retribution for throwing acid in the face of a woman in 2004, the semi-official fars news agency reported on saturday.
document.title: iran postpones blinding man in retribution punishment
lines_and_colors: iran has postponed blinding a convicted man in retribution for throwing acid in the face of a woman in 2004, the semi-official fars news agency reported on saturday.
